About Me

Get to know me...

Bio

I'm a highly productive individual with a desire to learn, collaborate, and succeed. Possesses strong organizational skills as well as the critical thinking required to find solutions to complex problems. Seeking a position to combine these skills with my growing knowledge of full stack web development to assist your company in meeting and surpassing its goals for success!

Currently, I am working to improve my software engineering skills in a remote position as a teaching assistant for a Coding Bootcamp course for the University of Texas at Austin. I also perform part-time work creating and maintaining a static web page for a local electric bicycle shop in Oceanside, CA.

I recently completed a Full Stack Web Development program at UCSD. I now possess the tools for creating a complete web application from client to server while utilizing coding languages such as HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. I also have experience with backend technologies including Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Sequelize; CSS frameworks such as Bootstrap and Materialize; and JavaScript libraries such as JQuery, React.js, etc.

I hope to obtain a position in which I can combine both the skills learned in the program with my desire to improve and strong work ethic to assist a company in meeting and surpassing its goals for success!
